text: Divorce mozhe retracted dvichi. divorced zhinka povynna buty dozvolena shchob prozhyty u tomu zhe dodomu amicably, abo lyshayutʹ tse amicably. Ne zakonno dlya cholovika vzyaty zadniy budʹ shcho vin dav yiy. Ale, para mozhe bo shcho vony mozhutʹ porushyty BOZHYY zakon. Yakshcho ye strakh shcho vony mozhutʹ porushyty BOZHYY zakon, vony ne zdiysnyuyutʹ pomylku yakshcho druzhyna okhoche daye zadnya shchob ni vona vybyraye. Tse - BOZHI zakony; ne porushte yikh. Tsey khto porushuyutʹ BOZHI zakony yavlyayutʹ soboyu unjust
